description: National Master Standing Offers for marine fuels in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board standards, as specified at Appendix A.

full_summary:
### Government of Canada Tender Announcement
#### Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) - Marine Fuel National Master Standing Offers (NMSO)
### Solicitation #WS3915620080

**key terms and conditions**
- **Project Title**: E60HL-230051_E RFSO Marine Fuel NMSO 2023-2025
- **Closing Date**: October 3, 2023 by 14:00:00 (Toronto Time)
**Procurement Details**
- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Solicitation Type**: Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)
- **Procurement Goal**: Issuance of National Master Standing Offers (NMSO) for marine fuels in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board standards.

**Background**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites potential suppliers to submit a offer for a National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) for marine fuels. The proposed offer is necessary to support the operational requirements of the Department of National Defence, Parks Canada Agency and the Department of Fisheries and Oceans.

**Requirements**
The offer must include:
- Requirements listed in Appendix "A"
- Delivery of marine fuels to various locations in Canada as requested during the period of the standing offer up to and including May 31, 2025.
- Option to deliver to destinations across Canada, including Comprehensive Land Claims Settlement Areas.

**Evaluation Criteria**
The evaluation will be based on the lowest price.

**Further Information**
Please refer to the original solicitation documents on Ariba Discovery for further information on the evaluation criteria and other details.

**Query Points**
Queries related to this solicitation must be submitted in writing via email to the contact point indicated below. All queries and responses will be published on Ariba Discovery.
